info.name: Chatbox API
info.description:
API documentation for Chatbox backend

Contact Support:
 Name: Tareq Ghassan
 Email: tareq.abusaleh47@gmail.com

request.description: Retrieves a paginated list of chats the user is a participant of.
Retrieves details of a chat by chat ID.

response.name: Bad request (missing or invalid chat ID)
Chat not found or user not a participant

request.description: Marks a chat as archived for the user.
Removes a chat from archived list for the user.
Un mutes notifications for a chat.
Marks a chat as deleted for the user. If all participants delete it, the chat is permanently removed.
Retrieves paginated messages for a chat.
Sends a new message in a chat.
Allows the sender to edit a message.

response.name: Forbidden - User is not the sender of the message.

request.description: Allows the sender to delete a message (soft delete).

response.name: Forbidden - User is not the sender of the message.

request.description: Marks a message as seen by the user.
Validates appKey and appSecret to initialize the server connection.

response.name: Invalid request, missing appKey or appSecret

request.description: Fetches the configuration settings including country codes.
Registers a new user and returns a JWT token.

response.name: Conflict - Email or phone number already exists

request.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.
Logs out the user by blacklisting the JWT token.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
